com.mambu.apisdk.util

Class ServiceHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mambu.apisdk.util.ServiceHelper

  • public class ServiceHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    ServiceHelper class provides helper methods for validating and building parameters and API definitions required for executing API requests common across different services. For example, there might be common operations required to build transaction parameters for both LoanService and SavingsService, or for API requests which are supported by multiple services (such as getting a list of entities for a Custom View, updating custom field value for an entity, etc.)

      • makeJSONApplyManualFeeRequest

        public static com.mambu.api.server.handler.loan.model.JSONApplyManualFee makeJSONApplyManualFeeRequest(java.util.List<com.mambu.loans.shared.model.CustomPredefinedFee> transactionFees,
                                                                                                       java.lang.Integer repaymentNumber,
                                                                                                       java.lang.String notes)
        Create JSON Transaction request for submitting applying predefined fee and specifying repayment number Available since Mambu 4.1. See MBU-12271, MBU-12272 (loan fees), MBU-12273 (savings fees)
        Parameters:
        transactionFees - transaction fees
        repaymentNumber - repayment number. Applicable only for loan transactions. Must be set to null for savings apply fee transaction
        notes - transaction notes
        Returns:
        JSON Apply Manual Fee Request

      • makeParamsForTransactionRequest

        public static ParamsMap makeParamsForTransactionRequest(java.lang.String transactionType,
                                                        com.mambu.api.server.handler.loan.model.JSONTransactionRequest transactionRequest)
        Create params map with as JSON request message for a transaction type
        Parameters:
        transactionType - transaction type string. Example: "DISBURSEMENT"
        transactionRequest - jSON transaction request. If null then the JSON string with only the transactionType is returned.
        Returns:
        params map with a JSON_OBJECT included

      • getContentForBase64EncodedMessage

        public static java.lang.String getContentForBase64EncodedMessage(java.lang.String apiResponse)
        Get Base64 encoded content from the API message containing bas64 encoding indicator and base64 encoded content Mambu API returns encoded files in the following format: "data:image/jpg;base64,/9j...." The encoded string is base64 encoded with CRLFs, E.g. 9j/4AAQSkZJR...\r\nnHBwgJC4nICIsIxwcKDcpL... This methods returns just the content part without the base64 indicator
        Parameters:
        apiResponse - api response message containing base64 indicator and base64 encoded string
        Returns:
        base64 encoded message content

      • makeParamsForLoanSchedule

        public static ParamsMap makeParamsForLoanSchedule(com.mambu.loans.shared.model.LoanAccount account,
                                                  ApiDefinition apiDefinition)
        Create ParamsMap with a map of fields for the GET loan schedule for the product API. Only fields applicable to the API are added to the params map
        Parameters:
        account - input loan account
        apiDefinition - api definition containing custom serializer for loan account to support generating request only with those fields required by the GET schedule API
        Returns:
        params map with fields for an API request

      • makePaginationParams

        public static ParamsMap makePaginationParams(java.lang.String offset,
                                             java.lang.String limit)
        Convenience helper to make parameters map which contains only pagination parameters: offset and limit
        Parameters:
        offset - pagination offset. If not null it must be an integer greater or equal to zero
        limit - pagination limit. If not null the must be an integer greater than zero
        Returns:
        ParamsMap

      • addAppkeyValueToJson

        public static java.lang.String addAppkeyValueToJson(java.lang.String appKey,
                                                    java.lang.String jsonString)
        Add appKey value to the json string.
        Parameters:
        appKey - app key value. Can be null
        jsonString - json string.
        Returns:
        json string with the appKey parameter added. If the appKey parameter is already present then the jsonString is not modified. See MBU-3892

      • getFullDetailsClass

        public static java.lang.Class<?> getFullDetailsClass(MambuEntityType entityType)
        Get class corresponding to the "full details" class for a Mambu Entity. For example, ClientExpanded.class for MambuEntityType.CLIENT;
        Parameters:
        entityType - entity type. Must not be null
        Returns:
        class representing full details class for the Mambu Entity or null if no such class exists

      • getUndoCloserTransactionType

        public static java.lang.String getUndoCloserTransactionType(com.mambu.loans.shared.model.LoanAccount account)
        Helper to determine the type of the Undo Closer Transaction for a closed loan account. The transaction type needed in UNDO closer API transactions. Can be also used to determine ahead of time if the UNDO Closer transaction can be performed via API for the specified account See MBU-13190. As of Mambu 4.2 the following UNDO closer types are supported "UNDO_REJECT", "UNDO_WITHDRAWN", "UNDO_CLOSE"
        Parameters:
        account - loan account. Must not be null and its state must not be null.
        Returns:
        UNDO close transaction type. Return null if account is not closed or if its closer type is not supported by Mambu API

      • getUndoCloserTransactionType

        public static java.lang.String getUndoCloserTransactionType(com.mambu.savings.shared.model.SavingsAccount account)
        Helper to determine the type of the Undo Closer Transaction for a closed savings account. The transaction type needed in UNDO closer API transactions. Can be also used to determine ahead of time if the UNDO Closer transaction can be performed via API for the specified account See MBU-13193. As of Mambu 4.2 the following UNDO closer types are supported "UNDO_REJECT", "UNDO_WITHDRAWN", "UNDO_CLOSE"
        Parameters:
        account - savings account. Must not be null and its state must not be null.
        Returns:
        UNDO close transaction type. Return null if account is not closed or if its closer type is not supported by Mambu API

      • getKeyForAccount

        public static java.lang.String getKeyForAccount(com.mambu.accounts.shared.model.Account account)
        Gets the encodedKey or the ID from the account passed as parameter in a call to this method.
        Parameters:
        account - The account used to obtain the ID or the encoded key from.
        Returns:
        a String key representing the encodedKey or the ID or null if both are null.
